blogPost.title: Britain’s new trading relationship with the EU will lead to the economy being around 4% smaller than it otherwise would have been https://t.co/eqYfFbKhgQ
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 英国与欧盟的新贸易关系将导致经济规模比原来小4%左右https://t.co/eqYfFbKhgQ。
英國與歐盟的新貿易關係將導致經濟規模比原來小4%左右https://t.co/eqYfFbKhgQ。

previous.title: Footage of Christopher Wallace recording his first demo aged 14, based around a sample of Toto’s “Africa”, suggests his interest in melody, as well as beats and rapping, developed early https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r

localize.full_text: 克里斯托弗-华莱士（Christopher Wallace）14岁时录制第一张样带的片段，围绕着Toto的 "Africa "样本，表明他对旋律、节拍和说唱的兴趣，很早就发展起来了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
克里斯托弗-華萊士（Christopher Wallace）14歲時錄製第一張樣帶的片段，圍繞着Toto的 "Africa "樣本，表明他對旋律、節拍和說唱的興趣，很早就發展起來了https://t.co/aMpHSe5R0r。
